Question: What features does the system consider?
Paraphrased: Which attributes does the model use to make predictions?

Question: Is [feature X] used or not used for the prediction?
Paraphrased: Does the model include [feature X] when making the prediction?

Question: How does it weight different features?
Paraphrased: How important is each attribute to the model's predictions?

Question: How does [feature X] impact the prediction?
Paraphrased: How strong does [feature X] affect the prediction?

Question: What are the top rules/features it uses?
Paraphrased: What are the most important attributes for this prediction?

Question: Why/how is this instance given this prediction?
Paraphrased: Why did the model give this particular prediction for this person?

Question: What features of this instance leads to the system's prediction?
Paraphrased: What attributes of this person led the model to make this prediction?

Question: Why/how is this instance NOT predicted …?
Paraphrased: Why didn't the model predict this person as [opposite class]?

Question: Why is this instance predicted P instead of Q?
Paraphrased: What caused the model to predict class [P] instead of class [Q] for this person?

Question: What would the system predict if this feature of the instance changes to …?
Paraphrased: What would happen to the prediction if we changed [feature] for this person?

Question: How should this instance change to get a different prediction?
Paraphrased: How should this person change to get a different prediction?

Question: How should this feature change to get a different prediction?
Paraphrased: How should this attribute change to get a different prediction?

Question: What is the scope of change permitted to still get the same prediction?
Paraphrased: Which changes to this person would still get the same prediction?

Question: What is the [highest/lowest/...] feature(s) one can have to still get the same prediction?
What is the necessary feature(s) present or absent to guarantee this prediction?
Paraphrased: What attributes must be present or absent to guarantee this prediction?
